EmailTemplate.subject: The Turboticker: The License Killer Edition
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Cloud & Virtualization Lessons Youâ€™ll Love Take control of your cloud and virtual environments Last Chance To Enter The October VMTurbo TurboStack Giveaway The TurboStack was created to enable you to experiment with OpenStack safely in your own home lab. Leveraging the OpenStack Juno build, the TurboStack also includes a full NFR License to VMTurbo 5.2. Enter To Win Here... The State of Latency, Containers & Microservices As organizations experiment and eventually transition to technologies such as containers and microservices they will inevitably encounter a new set of challenges, we'll discuss all these and more on our webinar Containers, Microservices and Why They Matter. Register Here... Maximizing The Benefits Of The Virtual Classroom How as IT administrators do you deliver the services your students need to succeed, when those needs are so varied? Not to mention, how do you do all this on a limited budget? Check out our latest e-Book today to learn cost-effective ways for delivering high quality educational services to your students and faculty. Download Here... Lessons Learned From Healthcare Data Centers Companies considering deploying VDI solutions are most often looking to lower costs while still ensuring their end-users have a seamless experience, but the process can be much more difficult than it initially appeared. Download this free webinar to learn how Children's Hospital Colorado assures performance for mission-critical applications and their VDI environment to deliver the highest quality for their end-users in a highly regulated industry. Watch here...
